comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Daughter of Senator Lee Slater Overman of North Carolina (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_Slater_Overman). She was a debutante of 1915/16 in Washingon society, see The Madison journal., January 15, 1916, Image 3, with the same photo. She was engaged in 1919, see photo in the Evening public ledger., February 15, 1919, Final, Image 20

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The gravesite of Grace Overman Snow (1896-1995): www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=28741337

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59 and pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for locating more about Grace Overman.Finding the same photo used in a newspaper is very helpful!  We will expand the catalog record to reflect these new details.
